reqs:
Co-reqs: NURS 511.
This course is primarily a part of the MHLP program and is a required course for 2nd year MPHMSN students.
MSN Students may be eligible to register with instructor permission. MSN Students: To obtain permission please email the instructor directly, and provide rationale as to how NURS 560 relates to your program of research or final project (SPAR or Thesis).
******* IF course is FULL please contact School of Nursing Student Support Office (student.services@nursing.ubc.ca) *******
The study of the processes and strategies influencing health and social policy, and the social and political contexts in which policy is created.
